dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI Odometry Dataset is used for evaluating the performance of models in autonomous driving scenarios, providing ground-truth data for various sequences.
dcterms:title: KITTI Odometry Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Behley
M. Garbade
A. Milioto
J. Quenzel
S. Behnke
C. Stachniss

dcterms:description: SemanticKITTI is utilized for generating semantic graphs and evaluating the performance of models by providing ground-truth labels and poses for LiDAR sequences.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI
